definition: to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: When the Master entered, they asked him exactly what the words meant.
sentences.chinese: 大師進來時，他們紛紛前來討教這話的含義。

sentences.english: Qi asked how to deal with obstacles or frustrations at work.
sentences.chinese: 齊林討教了如何去處理工作中的障礙或挫折的問題。

sentences.english: I may have to ask for your advice later on.
sentences.chinese: 以後少不得要去向您討教。

sentences.english: Within ten years, they were millionaires, and people were coming to Steve for advice.
sentences.chinese: 十年間，他們成爲百萬富翁，人們來向史蒂夫討教。
